ValidationRule.description: Case 33788553 - Prevent users from selecting a Due Date in the past when completing the Sales Help Request Form.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), Due_Date__c < TODAY(), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator')), RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Due Date cannot be in the past.
